I
September 28, 1955
Federal Communications Commission
Washington 2Â£, D. C.
Gentlemen!
Will you kindly send me your recently compiled list of transmitters
and monitors acceptable for use in aural broadcast services (AM and
FM). I plan to publish this list in the NAEB Engineering Newsletter
which goes to 220 Chief Engineers and engineers of educational radio
and television stations.
Thank you.
Yours very truly.
Cecil S. Bidlack
Television Engineer
